title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture         Cannon at Fort Lyon near the Pinnacle Overlook NPS Photo  Walk in the footsteps of early pioneers and Native Americans, visit the ruins of fortifications used in the Civil War, experience the life of an early mountain community... Numerous buildings, structures, and programs provide opportunities to experience the past.      Oral Histories    The History of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park      Photos of Yesteryear For more information and for research requests please call (606) 248-2817.      A Virtual Tour of the Hensley Settlement
